meanings.definition: A type of puppet character in Italian puppet theater.
meanings.sent1: The punchinello puppet danced on the stage.
meanings.sent2: The children laughed at the funny punchinello puppet show.
meanings.sent3: The punchinello puppet tried to juggle but kept dropping the balls.
meanings.sent4: His movements were as controlled as a punchinello puppet on strings.
meanings.sent5: The colorful punchinello puppet captured everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The circus had a hilarious punchinello entertaining the audience.
meanings.sent2: The punchinello's red nose and big shoes made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent3: The punchinello clown slipped on a banana peel and landed on a cake.
meanings.sent4: His antics were as silly as a punchinello clown at a birthday party.
meanings.sent5: The punchinello clown's jokes brought smiles to everyone's faces.

meanings.sent1: The little boy was a punchinello, always getting into harmless trouble.
meanings.sent2: She had a punchinello personality, making everyone around her laugh.
meanings.sent3: The punchinello prankster put fake spiders in his sister's room.
meanings.sent4: Her playful spirit was as lively as a punchinello in a comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The punchinello mischief-maker brightened up the dull day with his antics.
